General.Name: NARI Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: NARI Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides power intelligence solutions in China and internationally. It offers smart substation, smart power distribution, smart electricity, information and communication, energy, intelligent inspection, industrial control, municipal environmental protection, rail, intelligent regulation and power generation, smart power transmission, and water conservancy and affair solutions. NARI Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.
